specials.name: Bloodsense
specials.description: The Cretan Bull can precisely sense bleeding creatures within 60 feet.

specials.name: Blood Quarry
specials.description: On smelling a creatureâ€™s blood, the blood boar can designate that creature as its quarry. The Cretan Bull can smell its quarry from up to a mile away. A blood boar can have only one quarry at a time.

specials.name: Chasing Bull Rush
specials.description: The Cretan Bull Strides twice towards their quarry and then makes a horns Strike. As long as it moved at least 20 feet, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. A Medium or smaller creature struck by this attack must succeed at a DC 24 Reflex save or be knocked prone by the force of the blow.

specials.name: Terrifying Roar
specials.description: Each creature within 30 feet must succeed at a DC 25 Will save or become frightened 1 (frightened 2 on a critical failure). If the Cretan Bull uses Terrifying Roar on the same turn after using Chasing Bull Rush, the Will save DC is instead 27.

specials.name: Vicious Gore
specials.description: A Cretan Bull deals 2d6 extra persistent bleed damage to prone targets it hits with its horns.

specials.name: Kick
specials.description: If you're in the square directly behind the Cretan Bull and deal damage to him, he can attempt a foot strike to the attacker.

perception.note: bloodsense 60 feet, low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet
